#summary Benchmarks of jsonpickle
#labels Deprecated

= Compare jsonpickle using python-cjson and simplejson =

===Test machine=== 
Ubuntu 8.04, Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0GHz, 2.0 GB RAM


===Task===
Using an in-memory RSS feed that feedparser has parsed, encode then decode feed.  Run 1000 times using [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/python-cjson python-cjson] and 1000 times using [http://www.undefined.org/python/ simplejson].  The code to run the benchmark is located in src/benchmark.py

===Results===
{{{
# python benchmark.py
Using cjson
0.013447819 sec/pass 
Using simplejson
0.019652153 sec/pass 
}}}

===Reasoning===
simplejson has definite advantages, especially on Google's App Engine, where external C/C++ python modules are not allowed.  But, as these benchmarks show, cjson, when available is faster.
